short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Code-Format-Copy - automatically format code snippets from across the web. Spend more time coding, and less time formatting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copying code snippets, Stack Overflow suggestions, and minified files - it's something we as developers do countless times every day.

CoFoCo helps you copy-pasta with grace üçù , using your Prettier config to format JS, JSX, and TSX code to your liking before it hits your clipboard.

Support for more languages to come; let me know in the comments below what y'all would like to see!

CoFoCo doesn't track you or send your data anywhere. All configs are stored locally within your browser instance.
